review: Bottom line is that APPLE TV is nice but it is only as good as your internet service.  If you don't have HIGH speed, don't bother with this.
author: joshua turner

review: Ive had Roku's etc that lose wifi signals all the time and require you to re- enter wifi passwords constantly.This does not happen with the AppleTv. I love it.Its like what everybody says about apple products. THEY JUST WORK.Its a shame that this statement is rare today.
author: M. CLARK

review: We are an Mac/Apple household. AppleTV is great for our whole family. You can screen share from your Macbook Pro or send videos from the ipad to the tv. It reads all of the home shared iTunes accounts and with the recent updates HBO Go is an added bonus.
author: Charlotte Oliver Clearwater FL "Charlotte Oliver Clearwater FL"

review: Would love it if they would add amazon prime.  However, all in all it is much better in performance speed to load and pic quality I still gave it 5 stars
author: CTSteeler

review: Full disclosure: I'm an Apple junkie & rarely dislike an Apple product. My only frustration with this is that only Apple ID can be used to control the Apple TV. This is annoying for a mixed family with music, apps, etc. on different devices. Yes, it is easy to log in to the remote app with the one Apple ID, but I really would prefer that weren't necessary.
author: Kayla

review: I first bought a ROKU for accessing Amazon Prime but wanted another device for the other TV. I decided to go with the Apple TV. By using a remote desktop app like splashtop or logmein you still can share your movie playing on your computer through your ipad to the Apple TV..quality is not to bad. I still need to try a full movie, but feel it will work fine
author: Lynn Kennedy

review: I am very happy with this purchase. Other than not allowing Amazon videos, it works as intended. I hope that Amazon and Apple work it out, though.
author: USNA 05 DAD "IJPT"

review: Easy hook up and interface! I would recommend it, especially to anyone who is familiar with ease of use of Apple products! You can display slide shows directly from your iPhone or iPad! So easy!
author: Robert Tynes

review: More polished interface than the roku.  The integrated power supply makes it heavy enough to keep it in place.  The roku is so light that the cables move the whole unit.
author: epps83

review: Avoid if possible until Apple decides to allow developers to create apps, otherwise you have a $100 paperweight. Don't believe me look at the latest breaking news on the product that Apple is working on a deal with Time Warner Cable, WTF? You will have to be a subscriber to Time Warner to use it on the Apple TV which is plugged into the same TV...Steve Jobs said it best, this product was a hobby, I only wish they would have kept it in house..
author: Emily Cowles
